title: Primal Call
description: Thena Blaise is determined not to fall in love with a media hounded movie star despite the charming way he courts her. But Thena doesn't know the half of James Wilde's secrets - the dangerous half. James Wilde is a Vampire Prime, and he knows Thena must be his. As she is the bondmate he's waited his entire life to find.  Includes an excerpt of the upcoming Vampire Primes Novel PRIMAL CRAVINGS!
author: Susan Sizemore
